channel.title: Server Help
channel.description:
I recently decided that I would create a private server. I had the server files working, but I am looking for a new source and client.
However, every time I try to run a different source and client it won't let me connect.
Any recommendations on sources and clients?
Any suggestions?

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Efx Efx
item.description:
@Efx wrote:

Do you recommend any specific 508 files?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Hordes Hordes
item.description:
@Hordes wrote:

What kind of server is it?
317,474,459,508, ect…

If use choose to use a 317 you have to use a 317 client. [Silabsoft Client, Galkons, ect.]

If you choose to use a 508 you have to use a 508 client. [You can just google these and you can find these on the forums too…
Google: “508 IP Changer”]

Read full topic
